alert.note: Alert for Cass; Pulaski; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:33PM EDT until August 03 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR WHITE...SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI AND WESTERN CASS COUNTIES... At 533 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Winamac to near Monticello to near Otterbein, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Logansport, Monticello, Monon, Brookston, Wolcott, Royal Center, Pulaski, Reynolds, Chalmers, Burnettsville, Clymers, Smithson, Leases Corner, Indiana Beach, Idaville, Sitka, Thornhope, Lucerne, Buffalo and Badger Grove. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 185 and 198. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
